attributes.action: stop XL bully’s and XLamerican dogs from being banned.
attributes.additional_details: It is also a well-known fact that how a dog acts is a reflection of the owner's actions. Bad owners should be punished, not the breed of dog – hold bad owners accountable.
attributes.background: An XL bully is a "Heinz 57", a mixture of different breeds, so if you ban them then this will have implications for cross breeds of dog because nobody can be sure on the breed specifics. They are all different sizes and shapes. Just because a dog is big and muscular doesn't mean it can be labelled

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for the same action:

Bad owners are to blame not the breed - don't ban the XL bully: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
